title: Drawing, Design for a Round Table on Animal Hoof-Feet, February 4, 1906
title_raw: Design for a Round Table on Animal Hoof-Feet
markings:
Partial watermark: ORIENTAL LINEN
Stamped in faded purple ink, upper right corner: SEP 24 1903; below in blue ink, crossed out in graphite: APR 21 1905; and below in purple ink: FEB 4 1906
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: #2 / Price $165- / Mah dna / [inverted "V"] X [triangle]
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Round molded top wlth dividing stretcher running across center raised on 3 clustered columnar support sitting atop molded base with carved rosettes and acanthus leaves terminating in animal hoof feet.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for a Round Table on Animal Hoof-Feet, February 4, 1906. Graphite on thin, cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-136.
